summary:
- **Announcement Type**: New securities application (Appendix 2A)  
- **Securities Issued**: 3,000,000 ordinary shares (PCL) from conversion of options (PCLO)  
- **Issue Date**: 28/07/2025  
- **Issue Price**: AUD 0.012 per share (cash consideration)  
- **Post-Issue Capital**:  
  - Ordinary shares (PCL): 8,153,185,853  
  - Options (PCLO): 470,949,998 (expiring 08-Aug-2025)  
- **Other Outstanding Options**:  
  - 140,000,000 (expiring 30-Dec-2026)  
  - 70,000,000 (expiring 29-May-2027)  
  - 40,000,000 (expiring 18-Mar-2028)  
  - 60,000,000 (expiring 28-Jul-2027)  

No material valuation or liquidity impacts beyond routine option conversion.
